chunk-93d4d0771d13ab485a2ecb6bfe9432e8.description: ResNet-101 is a pretrained model developed by He et al., 2016, used for feature extraction in image analysis.
Adam is the default optimizer used in SentEval for training the classifier, introduced by Kingma and Ba, 2014.
MOSES tokenizer is a tool used for tokenizing datasets, developed by Koehn et al., 2007, mentioned in the context of preprocessing the data for SentEval.

SentEval is a framework for evaluating sentence embeddings, requiring implementation of prepare and batcher functions by the user. It uses a params object containing settings for the network and evaluation.
Transfer tasks refer to the set of tasks for which the sentence encoder is being evaluated, including MR and CR.
